title: wuyiwai's blog
subTitle: Hello World
style: body { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif; color: var(--text-color); background: var(--bg-color); line-height: 1.6; }
.markdown-body h1 { font-size: 2em; margin-bottom: 1em; color: var(--text-color); border-bottom: none; }
.markdown-body a { color: var(--primary-color); text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 1px solid transparent; transition: border-color 0.2s; }
.markdown-body pre { background: #f3f4f6; padding: 1em; border-radius: 8px; overflow-x: auto; }
styleInject: const style = document.createElement('style'); style.textContent = STYLE.join(' '); document.head.appendChild(style);
scriptInject: const script = document.createElement('script'); script.textContent = SCRIPT.join('\n'); document.body.appendChild(script);
